Transaction State Context.Lottery State: When users place bets by calling makeBet, their bets are recorded.
Transaction State Context.Organizer Management State: The organizer can view bets and destroy the contract, which is restricted to the contract creator.

External Interactions.Ether Transfer: The contract interacts with the sender to transfer ether based on whether the bet was won or lost. The transfer occurs when the makeBet function checks the 'won' condition.
